agreements.clausule-header: Klauzula informacyjna dla rodziców/ opiekunów prawnych dzieci biorących udział w programie MaliWspaniali
agreements.clausule: przekazywana w wykonaniu obowiązków przewidzianych w Rozporządzeniu Parlamentu Europejskiego i Rady(UE) 2016/679 z dnia 27 kwietnia 2016 r. w sprawie ochrony osób fizycznych w związku z przetwarzaniem danych osobowych i w sprawie swobodnego przepływutakich danych oraz uchylenia dyrektywy 95/46/WE (dalej jako RODO).
agreements.show-more-content-modal: Zobacz pełną treść w nowym oknie
agreements.sub-title-description: Zgoda na wykorzystanie wizerunku dziecka oraz na otrzymywanie informacji marketingowych nie są obowiązkowai nie skutkują one brakiem możliwości brania udziału w zajęciach.
agreements.statement: *Oświadczam, że zapoznałam/em się z treścią oraz akceptuję postanowienia

keycode-generation.title: KeyCode generate
keycode-generation.description: Choose for whom you want to generate registration codes and enter their number. After pressing “GENERATE” the codes will be exported to an .xlsx file. The keys will be active for 7 days. After this time, new keys should be generated.

child-profile.no-child: Sorry, there is no child with this id
child-profile.description: Check how your child managed fitness tests. Find out how tests prepared by specialists from the Mali Wspaniali foundation look like.
child-profile.participation-label: Permission to participate in the Mali Wspaniali program
child-profile.participation-description: This agreement is required as its allows your child to participate in classes organized by Mali Wapaniali - unchecking is impossible
child-profile.marketing-label: Permission to receive marketing information on provided e-mail address
child-profile.marketing-description: Optional agreement that allows us to send you emails with current informations about the Mali Wspaniali program.
child-profile.image-description: Optional agreement that allows us to use materials created during our classes (e.g. for program promotion)
child-profile.age-group: On the day of test, the child was assigned to the age group

result-description.medium: You are doing well but it can always be better

child-profile.no-result-block-text: did not take place or the child was unable to participate in the test that day.
child-profile.final-test-title: Results of particular tests with comparison of results from the initial test
child-profile.comparison-label: By comparing both tests, your child's fitness level
child-profile.comparison-right-title: See what form your child is in. The chart shows how the child's results have changed over two tests
child-profile.no-results-text: The results have not yet been entered because the initial test has not yet taken place, or the results are under development.
child-profile.no-results-text-last: The results have not yet been added for one of three reasons:
child-profile.no-results-list-1: The initial test has not yet taken place or the results are under development.
child-profile.no-results-list-2: Your child was absent on the day of the initial test or was unable to take part in the tes due to random reasons.
child-profile.no-results-list-3: Your child joined the Mali Wspaniali program after the first test. The next fitness test will take place in the spring.
child-profile.no-results-bottom: To find out what the fitness test looks like, visit the

recommendations.panel-title: Recommendation  - How to improve child's fitness
recommendations.title: Remember about daily activities
recommendations.text1-1: Children at the age of 3-4 years
recommendations.text1-3: 180 minutes of physical activities of any intensity spread throughout the day.
recommendations.text1-4: a variety of activities and games in various environments (on the playground, at home, in the woods, in a gym, in the water) and activities developing motor skills (throwing, grabbing, jumping, running, climbing, bouncing, .. .).
recommendations.subtitle1: Either way is good for everyday joint activity!
recommendations.text2: Children 5-11 years old should play vigorously or be physically active for at least 60 minutes every day. At least 3 days a week, activity should include high-intensity play / exercise to strengthen muscles and bones.
recommendations.subtitle2: 60 minutes a day - you can help your child achieve it!
recommendations.text3: The more daily physical activity, the greater the health benefits now and in the future.
recommendations.subtitle3: Sleep is key to health and development:
recommendations.text4: Preschoolers 3-5 years old should sleep 10 to 13 hours a day. Children 6-13 years old, from 9 to 11 hours.

agreements.heading: Manage consents granted to the Mali Wspaniali Foundation. Have full control over the security of your personal data, being able to increase or limit the rights granted at any time.
agreements.title: Below you can check and edit the signed agreements.
agreements.Image-description: Optional consent, but it allows us to use materials collected during the course, such as photos for promotional purposes, to encourage other parents to particopate in the program.
agreements.Marketing-title: Consent to receive marketing information to the provided e-mail address.
agreements.Marketing-description: Optional consent, but thanks to this consent, we will be able to send you an e-mail with current information about the Mali Wspaniali program. We will inform you about our achievements from time to time.
agreements.general-title: Consent to participate in the Mali Wspaniali program.
agreements.general-description: It is a compulsory consent, which is necessary for the child to participate in the activities conducted by Mali Wspaniali - it is impossible to uncheck it.

home-page-content.check-children-activity: Check out the children activity in the programme
home-page-content.foundation-content: We are a foundation from Wrocław that coordinates general sports activities with elements of karate in your child's kindergarten. Instructors conducting trainings focus primarily on cheerful, safe and active play, and supporting the harmonious development of your child. An inseparable element of the 'Mali Wspaniali' program are also tests of children's fitness. On the platform you will find test results that your child achieved in subsequent attempts, you will learn further recommendations and you will receive information about the development of children aged 3-6 that may be of interest to you.

blog-main-page.header: Here you will find out, how to take care of your child's development
